idea:
As people get older, a number of age-related conditions can make living at home increasingly difficult. Challenges like cognitive decline and decreased mobility can make living at home without assistance difficult and unsafe. Therefore senior mobility is one such need which we aim to address. We focus on mobility needs of senior citizens and these are categorized into four major buckets: 

1. Assisted Regular Mobility

2. Emergency Mobility

3. Mobility at Home

4.Mobility by Proxy(Concierge Services)
name: EVRCARE SENIORS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Gitanil Corp is a digital technology Consulting company based out in the financial capital Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Founded in 2019, the company serves small, mid-market, and large businesses across the world. Gitanil Corp helped, educate, and solved IT, Digital, and Social business challenges of Customers. Gitanil Corp believes in providing high-quality services and design solutions to maximize adoption, impact, and client success.

Gitanil Corp, is a partner of Google, Amazon, and Microsoft offerings Cloud Computing, Analytics, IoT, Website, and e-commerce portal development, Mobile App Development, Digital & Social media Marketing.
name: Gitanil Corp

idea:
We, BRITACEL HEALTH CARE PRIVATE LIMITED, are into the business of manufacturing of surface cleaner, toilet bowl cleaner, vegetable cleaner, dish washing liquid, glass & household cleaner, color catcher, disinfectant detergent, premium disinfectant softener.

Our Green cleaning products do not contain hazardous chemicals, and so they are likely to pose fewer health risks. They are also, typically, much safer and more suitable for use around people with weakened immune systems or health conditions.

We are driven by our purpose to protect, heal and nurture in the relentless pursuit of a cleaner, healthier world. We believe access to the highest quality hygiene, wellness and nourishment is a right for people across the world. We also care about the health and cleanliness of our environment and are proud of the sustainable way our business.
name: BRITACEL HEALTH CARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Founded in 2020, Greenie Energy is a technology company operating in the electric vehicles (EV) charging space.

The company’s offering is a hardware solution that can convert any simple electric charging socket into a EV charging point that can be purchased for as low as INR 5000.

Through Greenie Energy’s mobile app, the owner of any electric socket can control who charges their EVs on his socket, decide a billing rate, and make a profitable business out of it where Greenie Energy earns an 8% transaction fee for the value of the electricity used for charging.
Greenie Energy owns the intellectual property for this hardware solution which it intends to market to EV owners as well as commercial establishments such as malls, corporate parks, cinemas, housing societies etc.
name: GREENIE ENERGY TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
